item.title: Seventh Circuit Blocks Trump National Guard Deployment in Chicago
item.description: The administration has appealed to the Supreme Court as challenges in other states mount.

item.title: Josh Shapiro’s Destructive Energy Policies Spill Across the Border
item.description: The Pennsylvania governor’s approach to electricity is fueling a crisis in New Jersey.

item.title: The Self-Abasement of Canterbury
item.description: Missionary churches do not invite graffiti installations in their cathedrals; they invite people to join the faith.

item.title: The Met Goes Oceanic, Mayan, and Edo in the Reborn Rockefeller Wing
item.description: The art is fantastic, and it’s a tribute to Michael and Nelson Rockefeller.

item.title: The Case for a Second Front in the War on Fentanyl
item.description: Follow the money — specifically, the role of Chinese gangs in cleaning cartel cash.
